com.mapbox.android.gestures

Interface StandardScaleGestureDetector.StandardOnScaleGestureListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardScaleGestureDetector.SimpleStandardOnScaleGestureListener
    Enclosing class:
    StandardScaleGestureDetector

    public static interface StandardScaleGestureDetector.StandardOnScaleGestureListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onScale(StandardScaleGestureDetector detector)
      You can retrieve the base ScaleGestureDetector via StandardScaleGestureDetector.getUnderlyingScaleGestureDetector().
      boolean onScaleBegin(StandardScaleGestureDetector detector)
      You can retrieve the base ScaleGestureDetector via StandardScaleGestureDetector.getUnderlyingScaleGestureDetector().
      void onScaleEnd(StandardScaleGestureDetector detector, float velocityX, float velocityY)
      You can retrieve the base ScaleGestureDetector via StandardScaleGestureDetector.getUnderlyingScaleGestureDetector().

    • Method Detail

      • onScaleBegin

        boolean onScaleBegin(StandardScaleGestureDetector detector)
        You can retrieve the base ScaleGestureDetector via StandardScaleGestureDetector.getUnderlyingScaleGestureDetector().
        Parameters:
        detector - this detector
        Returns:
        true if you want to receive subsequent onScale(StandardScaleGestureDetector) callbacks, false if you want to ignore this gesture.
        See Also:
        ScaleGestureDetector.OnScaleGestureListener.onScaleBegin(ScaleGestureDetector)

      • onScale

        boolean onScale(StandardScaleGestureDetector detector)
        You can retrieve the base ScaleGestureDetector via StandardScaleGestureDetector.getUnderlyingScaleGestureDetector().
        Parameters:
        detector - this detector
        Returns:
        Whether or not the detector should consider this event as handled.
        See Also:
        ScaleGestureDetector.OnScaleGestureListener.onScale(ScaleGestureDetector)

      • onScaleEnd

        void onScaleEnd(StandardScaleGestureDetector detector,
                float velocityX,
                float velocityY)
        You can retrieve the base ScaleGestureDetector via StandardScaleGestureDetector.getUnderlyingScaleGestureDetector().
        Parameters:
        detector - this detector
        velocityX - velocityX of the gesture in the moment of lifting the fingers
        velocityY - velocityY of the gesture in the moment of lifting the fingers
        See Also:
        ScaleGestureDetector.OnScaleGestureListener.onScaleEnd(ScaleGestureDetector)
